newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies four issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies four issues for bond insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said on Wednesday that it qualified the following four municipal bond issues, which will be sold competitively, for insurance.
--Willmar ISD #347, Texas, $20.66 million GO refunding bonds.
--Harris County MUD #360, Texas, Unlimited Tax bonds $3.35 million.
